animes.description:
**Hometown:** Kyoto (?)
**Height:** 169 cm 

Takane Shijou is an elegant, mature woman. Although mysterious. Nobody is sure where's she's from or her backround story. She prefers not to answer any personal questions out of curiosity. She is considered one of the smarter characters in the series, and is fluent in numerous languages, one of which being German. Furthermore, it is implied in the anime that her native country is not Japan. In The Idolm@ster (TV Series) She is rumored to be of foreign royalty, giving her the nickname "Silver Queen."  Project-IM@S  Takane Shijou, an elegant and majestic figure, she is known as "The Silver Queen" by her fans in the game, and also known as "The Vocal Master" of 961 Production, rivaling, and even supposedly surpassing Chihaya's ability. She comes from a very wealthy family, like Iori, and is in fact half European, most likely German.  Because of the way Takane was raised in a rich family, she has a strong and stuck-up personality, though she talks very politely to others, even towards her rivals and enemies.  Even though very hard-headed sometimes, she hates being alone and in fact when alone she begins to cry while staring at the moon. Takane is also a very smart girl, almost comparable to Ritsuko, and though she does nothing against it, she is well aware that President Kuroi is telling her ridiculous lies.  Takane's family consists of herself and father, her mother having passed away when she was little. In fact she stated that she never even met her mother. She is raised by her strict butler due to her father frequently being away for business trips.  Takane has a strong passion for music and stage shows, she is also fluent in almost all languages related to Latin.

animes.description:
**Species:** Human
**Height:** 173 cm (5'8')
**Occupation:** Sorcerer, Student, Vessel
**Affiliation:** Jujutsu High

A muscular teenager with big light brown eyes and light brown spiky hair. Yuuji is a fair person who cares greatly for not only his comrades but anyone he views as people with their own wills, despite how deep or shallow his connection to them is. He cares greatly for the "value of a life" and to this end, he will ensure that others receive a "proper death." He is easy to anger in the face of pure cruelty and unfair judgment of other people.
He doesn't have the born talent required to use cursed techniques, but he has incredible athletic abilities and he is considered very strong for his age, as shown by when he easily beat a coach in Steel Ball Throw.

She always appears with [Charlotte](https://anilist.co/character/137517/Charlotte) and she usually tries to stop her from being too impulsive.

animes.description: She is [Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/137513/Kaname-Arisugawa)'s older sister. She is a lazy ditz but, [Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/137513/Kaname-Arisugawa) considers her on the "genius side" for her great learning capacity. In contrast with that, she usually misunderstands important things and she gets really confused in the blink of an eye. Her favorite hobby is probably playing video games and she usually nags [Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/137513/Kaname-Arisugawa) into playing with her.

animes.description:
**Height**: 154 cm
**Relatives**: [Tokiko Tsukuyomi](https://anilist.co/character/188292/Tokiko-Tsukuyomi) (grandaunt), [Enishi Yuzaki](https://anilist.co/character/190386/Enishi-Yuzaki) (father-in-law), [Kanoka Yuzaki](https://anilist.co/character/190388/Kanoka-Yuzaki) (mother-in-law)
**Likes**: Anime, games, movies, TV, radio, music, traditional arts, YouTube, etc.

Tsukasa Yuzaki is the wife of [Nasa Yuzaki](https://anilist.co/character/130944/Nasa-Yuzaki). Not much is known about her, but what is known is that she's mysteriously cute.

Tsukasa has long pink hair with a clasp on the back and pink-red eyes. She wears elegant clothing and a skirt. While at home she is usually seen wearing modern clothing. During her trip to Kyoto, she wore a floral Yukata.

Tsukasa comes across as calm and level-headed; seemingly unsurprised by Nasa's rash and illogical actions. Despite this, she agreed to marry him and love him dearly. She gets embarrassed easily whenever Nasa proclaims his love towards her and how cute she is. She has a huge love for movies, games, and pop-culture. She has a wide range of knowledge concerning aspects of Japanese history. This includes how to handle a Katana properly and information regarding various locations and landmarks. Tsukasa talks about such things as if she had experienced them herself but never elaborates.

~!Tsukasa is immortal and over 1400 years old, but maintains the appearance as a 16-year-old girl.!~

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki, edited)

title.english: Fly Me to the Moon
TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

title.romaji: Tonikaku Kawaii x Maou-jou de Oyasumi

Maki Nishikino is a first-year​ high school student in Otonokizaka High School. She has a beautiful voice and loves jazz music more than anyone else in the group. At first, she didn't want to join µ's because she had decided to inherit their family's hospital and take up medicine in college, but after joining forces with Rin to push Hanayo to join, she decides to follow the same path and join along with her two fellow first years.

animes.description:
**Height:** 153 cm
**Hometown:** Tokyo, Japan

Kanako is a soft-spoken, sweet girl with a passion for baking and desserts. Initially, she doesn't consider herself idol material because of her body image and low self esteem. She has a complex about her weight, even though she's just a bit thicker than the other girls. As her card levels up she slowly loses weight (2 cm from the waist), making her torso slightly smaller in the accompanying artwork. She is really good at making candies and sugary pastries, but it becomes a problem as she often eats the confectioneries she makes. She likes hair accessories, particularly those that feature flowers.

animes.description:
__Height:__ >190 cm (6'3")
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer, Teacher
__Affiliation:__ Tokyo Metropolitan Curse Technical College, Gojou Family
__Grade:__ Special Grade Sorcerer
__Cursed Technique:__ Six Eyes, Limitless

Satoru Gojo is one of the main protagonists of the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a special-grade jujutsu sorcerer and is widely recognized as the strongest in the world. Satoru is the pride of the Gojo Family, the first person to inherit both the Limitless and the Six Eyes in four hundred years. He works as a teacher at the Tokyo Jujutsu High and uses his influence to protect and train strong young allies.

In manga chapter 90/anime episode 33:~!During the Shibuya incident, Gojo is led into a trap and is sealed in the special grade cursed object "Prison Realm", where he is incapable of doing anything to affect the outside world.
!~Hence, in chapter 137, ~!Gojo is officially exiled from the Jujutsu world and deemed a criminal by the higher-ups. Any attempt to break the seal on Gojo is declared to be a criminal act, regardless of who tries.
!~In chapter 221,~!Gojo was released from the front end of the Prison Realm when [Angel](https://anilist.co/character/220724/Kurusu-Hana)'s technique was applied to its back end. It is unknown how short or long the imprisonment felt to Gojo, as time does not flow within the Prison Realm.
!~In chapter 236,~!Gojo was sliced in two horizontally by [Sukuna](https://anilist.co/character/133701/Sukuna) using Mahoraga. It is unclear whether he survived.!~

animes.description:
She was Nasa's classmate in middle school and is the same age as him. She currently owns an electronics store and apparently, she doesn't have any clear desire for affective relationships.

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki)

animes.description: Claudia is the second highest ranking student of Seidoukan Academy and its Student Council President. She recommended Ayato's transfer to the academy. She has held the position of President since junior high.

name.native: アリエル・アネモイ・アスラ

animes.description: Second Princess of the Asura Kingdom. She is hardly ever seen without her two bodyguards, [Luke](https://anilist.co/character/226703) and "[Silent Fitz](https://anilist.co/character/88346)". After surviving many assassination attempts, she and her bodyguards flee to The Magic City of Sharia and enroll at  the Ranoa Magic Academy.
